name: Swan Chain
description: SwanChain, initiated in 2021, is the first AI SuperChain for decentralized AI computing. Utilizing OP superchain technology, it pioneers in merging Web3 with AI by providing comprehensive solutions across storage, computing, bandwidth, and payments. By tapping into underutilized computing power across a network of community data centers, its integration facilitates a significant reduction in computing costs by up to 70% while enabling the monetization of dormant computing assets. Through innovative marketplaces for decentralized storage, AI, and AI agents, alongside the efficiency of toolsets for AI model deployment, SwanChain makes AI development seamless and affordable.
